name: Makers Mead
description: A simple yet tasty Honey Bourbon Vanilla Mead brought to you by the Vikings of days long past.
author: Dank1

reviews.text: Fantastic!  It tastes just like a smooth and refreshing sweet mead straight out of a horn.  As the last reviewer said, It's a rich, yet gentle flavor that's good for any time.  Only downside I've noticed so far is that it seems to be easily tainted, so take care when switching to this from a different flavor, and make sure your coils and cotton are clean.
I love this.  It's rich enough for a full vape, soft enough for vaping when you're sick, and flavorful enough to throw in an MTL for a softer caramel vape.
